attributes.action: have the BBC purchase UK rights to 'Firefly' TV series, by Joss Whedon
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Many people here in the UK are fans of Firefly, a TV series dropped by FOX, as the BBC is funded by us, the licence payer, we petition that the Prime Minister use his influence to ensure the BBC purchase the UK rights  to broadcast the TV series and show it.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
